member.name: M:Sitecore.Xdb.MarketingAutomation.ReportingClient.IAutomationReportingClient.GetPlanStatisticsAsync(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Guid})
member.summary: Get the plan statistics for one or more plans.
member.param: The IDs of the plans to get the statistics for.
member.returns: The for the plans which could be found.
member.remarks: If the parameter is null or empty, gets the statistics for all plans.

member.remarks: If the parameter is null or empty, gets the statistics for all plans.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Xdb.MarketingAutomation.ReportingClient.IAutomationReportingClient.GetPlanReportAsync(System.Guid,System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Get the plan report for a given plan, filtering by date
member.param: The ID of the plans to get the report for.
The starting date to get the report for.
The ending date to get the report for.
member.returns: The for the period. If the plan cannot be found, returns null.
